attributes.action: STOP THE PROPOSED CLOSURE OF CHARLOTTE TURNER PRIMARY SCHOOL GREENWICH
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As parents of Charlotte Turner Primary School we are asking for you help and support to to stop this proposal from going through.The school has been classed as under achiving we belive as parents that with the right help and support the scool can achive the national standers required.If the proposal is granted we feel our childrens education and well being will be affected due to the unsetlement.This will no dout have adverse affect on our children.We their for ask all to help us in our quest to save our school.
EVERY CHILD MATTERS
